chatbot.modules.v1.StructuredOutput.json.description: StructuredOutput defines configuration for extracting structured data from tool responses.

inputType.description: The format of the input data: "string" or "json"

model.description: The model to use for structured output extraction

outputSchema.description: JSON schema defining the structure of the output

ui.description: UI configuration for rendering structured output

chatbot.modules.v1.StructuredOutput.json.title: Structured Output

chatbot.modules.v1.StructuredOutputUi.js.description: StructuredOutputUi defines UI rendering configuration for structured outputs.

dataPath.description: Path to the data in the output (e.g., "flights")

enabled.description: Whether to render output as interactive UI components

isArray.description: Whether the data contains multiple items

itemConfig.description: JSON configuration for rendering each item

chatbot.modules.v1.StructuredOutputUi.js.title: Structured Output Ui
